sentence.text: Although poly(A)+ mRNA export from nucleus plays a critical role in the regulation of RNA processing, mutation of the gene encoding this ubiquitously expressed RNA binding protein causes a specific form of muscular dystrophy termed oculopharyngeal muscular dystrophy (poly(A)+ mRNA export from nucleus).
The MATR3 gene is mutated in a form of distal myopathy and amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (signal transduction).
